name: wheredoivote-usage-may-2018
title: WhereDoIVote usage May 2018
description:
Democracy Club WhereDoIVote usage by Local Authority 30th April 2018 - 3rd May 2018
Covers the 152 local authorities with a scheduled local or mayoral election on 3rd May 2018
